meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a puckered texture
meanings.sent1: I love wearing seersuckers in the summer because they are so light and breathable.
meanings.sent2: The seersuckers on the couch added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The seersuckers on the picnic blanket seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her dress, made of seersuckers, resembled a field of tiny hills.
meanings.sent5: The seersuckers felt like a gentle massage against my skin.

meanings.definition: A person who predicts the future or sees visions
meanings.sent1: The seersuckers at the fair amazed everyone with their accurate predictions.
meanings.sent2: In the story, the seersuckers warned the villagers of the impending storm.
meanings.sent3: The seersuckers at the party kept everyone entertained with their mystical insights.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the village seersuckers, always knowing what was to come.
meanings.sent5: The seersuckers' visions were like windows into another world.
